definition: Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]

pinyin: Zhong1 hua2 Su1 wei2 ai1 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: Union of Soviet Socialist Republics (USSR), 1922-1991/abbr. to 蘇聯|苏联[Su1 lian2] Soviet Union
pinyin: Su1 wei2 ai1 She4 hui4 zhu3 yi4 Gong4 he2 guo2 Lian2 meng2
containing_words.word: 蘇維埃社會主義共和國聯盟

pinyin: Su1 lian2 Zui4 gao1 Su1 wei2 ai1

sentences.english: Soon thereafter, they relinquished the town to the Soviets.
sentences.chinese: 從那以後不久，他們把這錯城鎮拱手讓給了蘇維埃。

sentences.english: Estonia reclaimed its independence and seceded from the Soviet Union.
sentences.chinese: 愛沙尼亞要求歸還其獨立權並退出蘇維埃聯盟。

sentences.english: According to Soviet concept healthiness was the key point of catering.
sentences.chinese: 按照蘇維埃的理念，食堂的核心是保證健康。

sentences.english: At the end of the Civil War, the Russian SFSR was exhausted and near ruin.
sentences.chinese: 內戰結束時，俄羅斯蘇維埃聯邦精疲力竭，頻臨崩潰。

sentences.english: I like Rosalia de Castro (1837~1885), Castro sovietized Cuba.
sentences.chinese: 卡斯特羅將古巴蘇維埃化。

sentences.english: In the fInal analysis, the strength In russia was on the side of the Soviets of Workers, Peasants and Soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 歸根結蒂，俄國的力量是在工農兵蘇維埃這方面。

sentences.english: But they neither anticipated nor desired the dismembering of the Soviet Union.
sentences.chinese: 但他們並不期盼也不渴望蘇維埃聯盟的解體。

sentences.english: The United States wants the former Soviet republic to join NATO (the North Atlantic Treaty Organization).
sentences.chinese: 美國希望這個前蘇維埃加盟共和國加入北約組織。

sentences.english: The Nazis murdered chiefly on racial grounds, while the Soviets concentrated on class.
sentences.chinese: 納粹殺人的理論依據是種族優劣，蘇維埃則強調階級。

sentences.english: After the October Revolution (1917), he threw himself into the struggle of defending the political power of Soviet.
sentences.chinese: 十月革命後投身於捍衛蘇維埃政權的鬥爭。

sentences.english: However, now it is more important to get rid of other Soviet symbols.
sentences.chinese: 然而現在最緊迫的事情是擺脫其他蘇維埃殘留的標誌。

sentences.english: However, the decision was made to add this document into the soviet archive.
sentences.chinese: 但是，最終決定將其封存在蘇維埃檔案館。

definition: Communist International or Comintern (1919-1943), also known as the Third International 第三國際|第三国际[Di4 san1 Guo2 ji4]
United Front (either of the two alliances between the Guomindang and the Communist Party, 1923-1927 and 1937-1945)
president (of a country)/same as 總統|总统
Nikita Khrushchev (1894-1971), secretary-general of Soviet Communist Party 1953-1964
Chen Jiongming (1878-1933), a leading warlord of Guangdong faction, defeated in 1925 and fled to Hong Kong
the Mukden or Manchurian Railway Incident of 18th September 1931 used by the Japanese as a pretext to annex Manchuria/also known as Liutiaogou incident 柳條溝事變|柳条沟事变
